Text: Awesome ! so fast ! thank you so much I went through the trouble of recovering my account for this purpose !

Thanks a lot man.  Doesn't air over here in Canada for at least another week.  

On another note, that new Sherlock series that came out over there is pretty good too.  The original pilot was amazing but then they re-did it to add Mycroft into the story.  The worst professor Moriarty ever though.

@animalmcburger maybe it's my age the older you are the more you remember, but i must say that i much prefer the older series of Sherlock Holmes with Jeremy Brett i have all of his box sets and my husband also prefers him

@abj642 youre never too late i always look forward to hearing from you and don't mind people calling me man it's just a term of endearment i was actually called TPB Granny but now it will have to be TPB Great Granny as i now have 2 great grandsons

@ajaxen94
i was just pointing out to animalmcburger that we are indebted to a 'female' for providing us with free entertainment regularly. i dont know if there are many active female users/uploaders over here on the bay:):)
